It's a gritty, action-packed thriller that explores the cat-and-mouse game between two detectives and a powerful Russian crime boss lady in the midst of the Cold War. With a talented cast, including Corbin Bernsen and Bob Hoskins, this film is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!

With an all-star cast, including Josh Hartnett and Ewan McGregor, it's a must-see for fans of war movies.

If you're looking for something a bit different, "Smilla's Sense of Snow" might be up your alley. This 1997 thriller follows a half-Inuit detective as she investigates the mysterious death of a young boy in Copenhagen, and it's got all the makings of a great mystery movie.
